title: The Alpha's Desire
description: Christina never had a real relationship, let alone a social life. Yet when her best friends invite her to have a fun night out, Christina never expected that her path would cross with the tempting Lex Roberts.Their connection is so fierce and undeniable that her future will never be the same again.  The Alphaâ€™s Desire: Part One is 40,630 words of Paranormal/BBW romance. Intended for mature audiences.
author: Willow Brooks
